text: Meubri keu jihnyan teuma peurinath Bandum urusan Kamoe peunyata Teuma meudakwa di jih that leupah ‘Oh Iheun ‘*eleumee bak jih ka teuka Jipeugot dawa lawan peurintah Sabab dengki jih sabe keudroe-droe Neuhukom dudoe teuma le Allah Uroe kiamat Neuhukom teuma Uleh Po gata nyang Maha Murah Peue nyang yoh dilee jipeugot dawa
